  • Package net.edudb.page

    • Class net.edudb.page.BinaryPage extends Page implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      4813060042690551966L

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          java.lang.String name
          Name of the page.

        • records

          Record[] records
          Array holding the records in the page.

        • nextLocation

          int nextLocation
          The location in the page where the next record should be placed next.

        • openCount

          int openCount
          Used to monitor how many threads are currently using the page. Used by the buffer manager to allow the page to reside in the pool if it must be replaced.
